title: 2. Is America's Obesity Epidemic For Real?
description: Americans keep putting on pounds. So is it time for a cheeseburger tax? Or would a chill pill be the best medicine? In this episode, we explore the underbelly of fat through the eyes of a 280-pound woman, a top White House doctor, and a couple of overweight academics.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
